info.title: Enterprise Project - Read Deliverable Type
info.description: This service enables you to read the type of project element deliverables along with corresponding descriptions. You can use this service, for example, to retrieve supported values for the corresponding field in the Project Element Deliverable entity of the Enterprise Project service, or to make the descriptions of the deliverable type values available for your custom application.

x-sap-shortText: Read the type of project element deliverables using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Enterprise Project Element - Deliverable Type Integration(SAP_COM_0917)
